name: It is Not Reel
description:
Congratulations! You have inherited a small fishing company. One day, it may even be a factory.

In "It Is Not Reel" you play as a fisherman building your empire from the ground up. As time passes, you may choose to sacrifice the ecosystem to meet the demand for your products; dabbling in unethical practices while selling your "fish".

How far will you go until nothing is real?
